meanings.definition: Work done remotely using telecommunications technology.
meanings.sent1: Many companies now offer telework options for their employees.
meanings.sent2: Telework has become more common with the advancement of technology.
meanings.sent3: The idea of telework seemed like a dream come true for the employees.
meanings.sent4: In a world of telework, the office walls disappear, and the possibilities expand.
meanings.sent5: Telework allows individuals to work from anywhere with an internet connection.

meanings.definition: The act of working from a location other than a traditional office.
meanings.sent1: Telework offers flexibility for employees to work from home.
meanings.sent2: Some people find telework more productive than working in an office.
meanings.sent3: The concept of telework made the employees excited to set up their home offices.
meanings.sent4: Telework opens up a new world of possibilities for where work can be done.
meanings.sent5: With telework, the boundaries of the traditional office setting blur.
